channel.title: CVE Feed for Advantech iView -- iView

item.title: CVE-2022-2143|2024-09-16T19:36:30.182Z -- advantech%20iview -- iview
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to two instances of command injection, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-2142|2024-09-16T17:14:59.801Z -- advantech%20iview -- iview
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a SQL injection with high attack complexity, which may allow an unauthorized attacker to disclose information.
